”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Stay informed and in touch with KTIV News 4 news and weather headlines for Siouxland. KTIV, located in Sioux City, Iowa, has a rich tradition of journalistic excellence and service to the communities we serve. Sioux City is at the center of a tri-state region known as “Siouxland” where Iowa, Nebraska and South Dakota meet.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
